summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation, making an appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund, increasing the expenditure authority for the Department of Parks and Recreation in the 1996 Budget, establishing one full-time Public Education Program Specialist position, and authorizing solicitations, applications, and acceptance by the Superintendent of grants, donations, and other resources, in order to support and continue the Seattle Aquarium's Puget Sound On Wheels Program, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
